# Opening up our Minds (OuM) Shiny App

The purpose of the OuM app is to allow for the exploration of the data collected as part of the Opening up our Minds project. Specifically, it allows users to view the arguments made for or against a particular topic, explore whether they were made by an individuals whose views aligned with the argument in question (i.e. whether they were pro or anti that topic), how they were rated by others and whether the raters were pro-or anti that topic.
